import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Css/Menubar.css' import { useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import PageComponent from './PageComponent.js' export default function MenuBar() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [activesection, setActiveSection] = useState(false); const handletoggle = (section) => { setActiveSection(activesection === section ? '' : section) } function DescriptionModal( { title, description, onClose}) { return (

{title}

{description}

) } return (
    navigate(Element = { PageComponent })}>Whitelist
    handletoggle('VideoUpscaler')}>LearnReflect's AI Videoupscaler {activesection === 'VideoUpscaler' &&
  • Introducing our cutting-edge AI Model Upscaling Software, designed to transform your visual content with unparalleled precision and efficiency. This innovative tool offers various upscaling types, ensuring you can choose the best method to enhance your images and videos according to your specific needs. Our software supports multiple output types, allowing seamless integration into your existing workflows, whether for web use, print, or high-resolution displays. With AI interpolation, you can enjoy remarkable detail enhancement and clarity, making even low-resolution images appear stunningly sharp. The software also accommodates a wide range of input resolutions, ensuring versatility across different media formats. Furthermore, our AI multithreading capability maximizes processing power, significantly reducing wait times and enhancing performance during intensive upscaling tasks. Unlock the full potential of your media with our AI Model Upscaling Software, and experience a new standard in image and video enhancement.
    • }
    handletoggle('AudioUpscaler')}> LearnReflect's AI AudioUpscaler {activesection === 'AudioUpscaler' &&
  • Audio Upscaling Software Our upscaling program, Audio Enc, is designed to elevate your audio experience to new heights. With advanced sound enhancement algorithms, Audio Enc enables you to convert and improve the quality of music, podcasts, and other audio content. The software supports multiple file formats and delivers crystal-clear sound, providing listeners with a richer and more immersive experience. Whether you are a professional audio engineer or a music enthusiast, Audio Enc will help you achieve optimal sound quality with ease and efficiency. modell, Audio Denoise modell, Vocal remover/isolator modell.
    • }
    handletoggle('description')}>LearnReflect's AI Chatbot {activesection === 'description' &&
  • LR-Chatbot: Your Personalized Self-Improvement Assistant Introducing the LR-Chatbot, an integral component of the LearnReflect self-improvement platform, designed to empower your personal growth journey. This AI-driven chatbot leverages advanced machine learning techniques to provide tailored guidance and support as you work towards achieving your goals. Pre-trained specifically for self-improvement, the LR-Chatbot engages in meaningful conversations, continuously learning from your interactions to adapt to your unique aspirations. Whether you're striving to build discipline, enhance motivation, or develop effective daily routines, this chatbot becomes a personal companion dedicated to your success. The LR-Chatbot offers personalized discipline-building strategies and motivation techniques, ensuring that you remain focused and accountable on your journey. With its ability to understand your evolving needs, the chatbot provides insights and encouragement that resonate with you, making self-improvement an achievable goal. In conjunction with our advanced AI models for enhancing video and audio quality, LearnReflect serves as an all-in-one solution for anyone committed to self-improvement and productivity. Whether you're aiming to boost daily habits or pursue long-term achievements, the LR-Chatbot is here to guide you every step of the way, helping you become the best version of yourself.
    • }
    navigate()}>Contact {activesection === 'contact' &&
    • }
) }
